title: Tempest Rise
description: A Science Fiction based Paranormal Thriller !Take a strong willed female surgeon mix in the boisterous ruler of an ancient nation filled with empathic healers and dangerous beasts, add a psychotic serial killer bent on revenge and stir!Dr. Lysette Nolan is one of Lon Tesse's most prominent pediatric surgeons and the niece of the Regent Dana's Head of Intelligence. Her uncle invites Lysette to the Regent's summer retreat where she encounters Prince Katar, the heir of Treborel, a mysterious kingdom that follows the ancient ways of empathic healing. He is brash, impulsive and charismatic. She's quiet, introspective and curious about the empathic healers. Their romance takes them deep into the bowels of a continental conflict where Lysette becomes the target of the psychotic commander of the enemies forces. Lysette's only weapon is her long bow, but how can a long bow fight against blasters and gigantic mountain predators?
author: Alaina Stanford
